Package de.fhe.ai.storage

Interface IBaseRepository

All Known Subinterfaces:
IConnectionRepository, ILineRepository, IStationRepository, ITramRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionRepository, LineRepository, StationRepository, TramRepository
public interface IBaseRepository
A base repository interface providing some standard method for storage handling.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void delete​(ModelBase entity)
    Deletes a given entity from the database.
    java.util.List<ModelBase> getAllEntities()
    Gets a list of all entities of this table from the storage.
    ModelBase getEntityById​(int id)
    Gets an entity from the storage by there ID.
    void insert​(ModelBase entity, java.lang.Runnable callback)
    Saves an entity to the storage.
    void update​(ModelBase entity)
    Updates an existing entity inside the storage.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      void insert​(ModelBase entity, java.lang.Runnable callback)
      Saves an entity to the storage.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity that will be inserted.

    • update

      void update​(ModelBase entity)
      Updates an existing entity inside the storage.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity that will be updated.

    • delete

      void delete​(ModelBase entity)
      Deletes a given entity from the database.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity that will be deleted.

    • getAllEntities

      java.util.List<ModelBase> getAllEntities()
      Gets a list of all entities of this table from the storage.
      Returns:
      A list of all entities.

    • getEntityById

      ModelBase getEntityById​(int id)
      Gets an entity from the storage by there ID.
      Returns:
      An entity with the given id.
